text: Boisleux-Saint-Marc () is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region in northern France. ==Geography== A farming village located 7 miles (11 km) south of Arras on the D35 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Médard, rebuilt after the destruction of the village during World War I. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * War Cemetery Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais Category:World War I cemeteries in France
title: Boisleux-Saint-Marc
